file info.description: Site Secrets - Unique secret values per site
file info.file format: JSON standard with variables in unnamed base dictionary (JSON: Object) and nested site dictionary (JSON: Object)
file info.use format: This file is loaded into the dictionary sub-key 'secret' nested in the dictionary sub-key 'site'
file info.note: Do not put secrets in github stored files! Mask secrets with {{ site.secret.<var> }}. Secrets go into ~/.secrets/site_secrets.json
file info.note2: This is a generic file. There's only one site as all sites should have the same generic info. Individual sites must be edited in ~/.secrets/site_secrets.json
